headline: Should You Reconsider Campbell's After Shares Slide Over 30% This Past Year?
summary: Let’s say you’re eyeing Campbell’s stock and wondering whether this could be the right time to make a move. After all, a recognizable brand doesn’t always guarantee a rewarding investment. Lately, Campbell’s shares have been on a pretty dramatic slide, dropping 5.4% over the past week and a striking 11.4% in the last 30 days. On a longer timeline, the numbers don’t get sunnier: the stock is down 28.9% year-to-date and off more than 34% over the past year. Even the 3- and 5-year returns paint...
